content: direct link to pattern pdf 1 pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard crochet symbols **materials** * japanese size 10/0 6 0 mm crochet hook * color a approx 60g 26 meters * color b approx 90g 40 meters * color c approx 55g 24 44 meters * color d approx 70g 31 11 meters * color e approx 60g 26 meters **note ** the name of the yarn ajisai means hydrangea in japanese hence the name of the pattern 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/28ss/g503 pdf
